description:
This is the BEST Strawberry Cheesecake recipe I've made to date! A nice natural cheesecake base smothered with a strawberry compote with pieces of strawberry mixed into the sauce.

Cheesecake base: WF Strawberry Cheesecake, CAP NY Cheesecake, FW Graham Cracker

Strawberry ğŸ“ Compote: WF Strawberry Gummy Candy (the syrup), FA Juicy Strawberry, TPA Strawberry Ripe (provides the fresh strawberry pieces) 

Give it a mix & let me know what you think ğŸ§ 3 days is enough for it to meld but I'm sure it'll only get better with more time...ğŸ¤¤ğŸ¤¤ğŸ¤¤ Sweetener is a necessity for me but feel free to add or remove your own... Hope y'all enjoy it as much as I do!ğŸ‘ŠğŸ˜ƒ
author: KylezKloudz

reviews.text: Very nice after just 2 days.  Thanks for my new ADV!
